definitions.definition: kept at a very low temperature in order to preserve it

examples.text: a major producer of canned and frozen foods
He fumbled in his pocket with frozen fingers.

definitions.definition: with a layer of ice on the surface

examples.text: There were skaters on the frozen river.
The surface of the lake is permanently frozen.

definitions.definition: covered with ice; so cold that it has become very hard

examples.text: They adapted to the harsh conditions of the frozen north.

definitions.definition: unable to move because of a strong emotion such as fear or horror

examples.text: She stared at him, frozen with shock.
His white face was frozen in fear.
I stood **frozen to the spot**, unable to speak.
